headerText: The `v-data-iterator` component is used for displaying data, and shares a majority of its functionality with the `v-data-table` component. Features include sorting, searching, pagination, and selection.

usage.desc: The `v-data-iterator` allows you to customize exactly how to display your data. In this example we are using a grid list with cards.

slots.desc: The `v-data-iterator` has both a header and footer slot for adding extra content

expand.desc: The `v-data-iterator` has internal state for both selection and expansion, just like `v-data-table`. In this example we use the methods `isExpanded` and `expand` available on the default scoped slot.

v-data-iterator.itemKey: The property on each item that is used as a unique key
v-data-iterator.singleSelect: Changes selection mode to single select
v-data-iterator.expanded: Array of expanded items. Can be used with `.sync` modifier
v-data-iterator.singleExpand: Changes expansion mode to single expand
v-data-iterator.loading: If `true` and no items are provided, then a loading text will be shown
v-data-iterator.loadingText: Text shown when `loading` is true and no items are provided
v-data-iterator.noResultsText: Text shown when `search` prop is used and there are no results
v-data-iterator.noDataText: Text shown when no items are provided to the component
v-data-iterator.footerProps: See the `v-data-footer` API for more information

v-data-footer.itemsPerPageOptions: Array of options to show in the items-per-page dropdown
v-data-footer.itemsPerPageAllText: Text for 'All' option in items-per-page dropdown
v-data-footer.showCurrentPage: Show current page number between prev/next icons

v-data-iterator.footer: Defines a footer below the items
v-data-iterator.footer.page-text: This slot is forwarded to the default footer. See the `v-data-footer` API for more information
v-data-iterator.default: The default slot. Use this to render your items
v-data-iterator.header: Defines a header above the items
Defines a header above the items
v-data-iterator.footer: Defines a footer below the items
v-data-iterator.loading: Defines content for when `loading` is true and no items are provided
v-data-iterator.no-data: Defines content for when no items are provided
v-data-iterator.no-results: Defines content for when `search` is provided but no results are found

v-data-footer.page-text: Defines content for the items-per-page text

v-data-iterator.item-selected: Event emitted when an item is selected or deselected
v-data-iterator.item-expanded: Event emitted when an item is expanded or closed
